mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUTHORITY SELECT SEQ_AID.NEXTVAL,#{mNo},#{mName},SYSDATE,#{address},#{aContent},#{aCode},'N',NULL,'N',#{img_file},#{site_url}FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM AUTHORITY WHERE ACODE=#{aCode} AND MNO=#{mNo})
mapper.select: select mno, mname, (select mnick from member m where m.mno = a.mno) mnick, address, acontent, acode, atake, grant_date,delflag, request_date, (select substr(aname,0,4) from authority_type at where a.acode = at.acode) aname, img_file, site_url from authority a where mno = #{mno}

select mno, mname, (select mnick from member m where m.mno = a.mno) mnick, address, acontent, acode, atake, grant_date,delflag, request_date, (select substr(aname,0,4) from authority_type at where a.acode = at.acode) aname, img_file, site_url from authority a where mno = #{mno} and acode = #{acode} and grant_date is null
mapper.update: update authority a set atake = 'Y', grant_date = sysdate where mno = (select mno from member where mnick = #{mnick}) and acode = #{acode}
update authority set delflag = 'Y' where mno = (select mno from member where mnick = #{mnick}) and acode = #{acode}
